attributes.action: increase speed limits on all roads outside 30mph zones to reduce congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ideally these non-urban roads (especially motorways) should not have any speed limit, but a good starting point would be 90 mph on non-motorways and 110 mph on motorways.
Increasing these limits will stop the dreaded "bunching" and resulting jams. The existing congestion is caused by unrealistically low speed limits so that the traffic does not/ cannot flow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
